call_title: Last Byte Bar | Marc The Shark | ErgoHack 9

commitments.commitment: Will have various GitHub repos to show how to implement the protocol and maybe some sites running it
commitments.quote: we'll have various GitHub repos to sort of show how to do this, maybe even some sites that are running this

commitments.commitment: Will remove the protocol owner spending capability on mainnet to prevent rugging
commitments.quote: But obviously, we'll take that out on mainnet. So people don't rug.

commitments.commitment: Will submit this project for ErgoHack 9
commitments.quote: We're excited to submit this and see what happens.

open_questions.question: Whether staking opportunities make sense for this protocol
open_questions.context: Considering adding staking for synthetic GPU mining rewards but uncertain if it's a good idea

open_questions.question: Community feedback on the overall Mining Rights Protocol concept
open_questions.context: Seeking input on potential issues or improvements not considered

key_facts.fact: Transaction fees cost 0.001 ERG per TX
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Prototypes of the system are working and coded in Python
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Sample token emission is planned for 10 years with halving mechanism
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark
